website_summaries.verdict: Thanks to its stellar performance and affordable price, the Nexus 7 is the Android tablet to get.
pros: The Nexus 7’s razor-sharp full-HD screen, silky smooth performance, long battery life, meager weight, and affordable price make it the best tablet value on the market
cons: The back is missing the soft grippy texture of the original, screen colors lack accuracy, and there's no microSD support
Android 4.3 has few useful interface improvements

customer_reviews.title: Love the screen display...
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving the Nexus 7 four stars because for the most part it did meet my expectations. However, I feel that the speakers and the camera were misrepresented. The sound quality is good but the volume could be better. The camera takes decent pics but you have to be close to the subject. Had those two things not been specifically mentioned as above average, I would have no complaints. Screen display is excellent. That said, I'm pleased with the product. I'm partial to android so I like being able to have the same apps on my tablet that I love on my S5.
customer_reviews.author: D. Valentine

customer_reviews.title: Buy this gem before it's gone!
customer_reviews.text: Google doesn't make them any more but these things are a gem. PURE untouched stock Android as it's MEANT TO BE. No skins or bloatware. You can update it to Marshmallow out of the box, it's 1080p (Slightly higher), outperforms most tablets today (even though it's from 2013!) and... Just buy it. It's the living embodiment of bang for your buck. This review comes straight from an android veteran and this Nexus 7.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Haggerty

customer_reviews.title: Will miss this tablet
customer_reviews.text: These tablets are just great for the kids. Great size, great customizability, relatively durable (esp with a bobj case or something). I hate that they wont be available much longer.
customer_reviews.author: Chipras3

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The nexus arrived and operates as advertised. I would buy from this vendor again.

customer_reviews.author: Phaad1

customer_reviews.title: like hearthstone, but it works great
customer_reviews.text: I've had this tablet for 5 years and it still works amazingly well. It can't handle the heaviest apps, like hearthstone, but it works great. I dropped it on rocks once and nothing got damaged. The battery still charges and lasts seemingly just as long as when I bought it. I just wish ASUS would make an upgraded model, it is an old model and I'd like some day to get one with more RAM, more processing power, but the same perfect 7" size.
customer_reviews.author: Merlin

product_meta.title: 7" Quad Core 16gb 2gb
product_meta.description: The new black Google Nexus 7" Tablet Wi-Fi Touchscreen Featuring 4.3 (Jelly Bean) Operating System ensures all day use without compromising performance.
feature_bullets: This refurbished product is tested and certified to look and work like new. The refurbishing process includes functionality testing, basic cleaning, inspection, and repackaging. The product ships with all relevant accessories, and may arrive in a generic box
